text: Haplophragma adenophyllum is a species of flowering plant in the family Bignoniaceae that is native to the Andaman Islands , Assam, Myanmar, and Bangladesh. It is commonly known as katsagon, marodphali, petthan, and Karen wood. ==References== Category:Bignoniaceae Category:Flora of Assam (region) Category:Flora of the Andaman Islands Category:Flora of Bangladesh Category:Flora of Myanmar
title: Haplophragma adenophyllum
